text: Sir Thomas Talbot (born 1507/1508 died 1 August 1558), of Bashall, Yorkshire, Rishton and Lower Darwen, Lancashire, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Lancashire in 1558. ==References== Category:1558 deaths Category:English MPs 1558 Category:Members of the Parliament of England (pre-1707) for Lancashire Category:People from Ribble Valley (district) Category:Year of birth uncertain
title: Thomas Talbot (MP for Lancashire)
